text: C. Kevin Boyce is a paleobotanist. He is best known for winning a MacArthur Award in 2013. Boyce's work deals with the relationship between current and past ecosystems. Prior to his employment at Stanford, Boyce was associated with the University of Chicago. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Paleobotanists Category:Stanford University staff Category:Harvard University alumni Category:MacArthur Fellows Category:People from Stanford, California Category:California Institute of Technology alumni
title: C. Kevin Boyce
